me.ryandw11.ultrabar.api

Class UltraBarAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ryandw11.ultrabar.api.UltraBarAPI

  • public final class UltraBarAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main api class for UltraBar. Please see BossBarBuilder for the creation of boss bars.

      • sendTitle

        public void sendTitle(org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                      java.lang.String title,
                      java.lang.String subtitle,
                      int fadein,
                      int time,
                      int fadeout)
        Send a title using the system.
        Parameters:
        p - The player
        title - The title
        subtitle - The subtitle
        fadein - The time it should take to fade in
        time - The amount of time the title should be on the screen.
        fadeout - The time it should take to fade out.

      • sendActionBar

        public void sendActionBar(org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                          java.lang.String message)
        Send an action bar using the plugin. (Automatically gets the server version. NMS is handled with the plugin).
        Parameters:
        p - The player to send the action bar to.
        message - The message.
